backend/main.mo: Actor includes blob storage mixin and exposes a stubbed convertWordToPdf function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file documenting a UI styling update and listing related components and files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light and dark themes with utility applications.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document with metadata and script entry point for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all app routes and rendering RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Reusable ad slot component rendering styled placeholder blocks by variant.
frontend/src/components/blog/blogPosts.t: Static blog post registry exporting metadata for available posts.
frontend/src/components/faq/ToolFaq.tsx: Reusable FAQ component rendering a list of Q&A entries inside an accordion.
frontend/src/components/home/BlogPreview: Lists two latest blog posts with preview cards and link to full blog index.
frontend/src/components/home/Hero.tsx: Hero section with headline, description, and main CTA button linking to merge PDF tool.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeFaq.tsx: Home page FAQ section with predefined questions rendered in an accordion.
frontend/src/components/home/toolsCatalo: Defines metadata for all tools including labels, descriptions, routes, and icons.
frontend/src/components/home/ToolsGrid.t: Displays all tools from TOOLS_CATALOG as cards with icons and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with tool links, trust notes, and a URL copy button. Handles copying the site URL and displays sections for PDF tools, image tools, and resources.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Provides a responsive navigation bar with logo, links, and a Get Started button. Includes a mobile menu toggle and navigation behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the site structure with navbar, footer, sidebar ads, and an outlet for page content. Ensures consistent layout and placements of ad slots.
frontend/src/components/seo/RelatedTools: Displays a card listing related tools based on the current tool and provided IDs. Pulls metadata from the tools catalog and links to each tool’s route.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Applies SEO metadata for a page using a custom hook. Renders nothing visually.
frontend/src/components/tools/image/Imag: UI for configuring image resize options including pixel, percentage, and target-size modes with validation before processing.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/ImageT: Form for choosing PDF page size, image fit mode, and margins when converting images to a PDF.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Remove: Input UI for specifying PDF pages to remove using comma and range syntax with examples.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Resize: Selector for choosing a target PDF page size from common formats.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Waterm: Controls for editing watermark text, position, style, opacity, font size, and rotation.
Canvas-based preview rendering the configured watermark on an A4-like mock page.
frontend/src/components/tools/processors: Barrel file exporting PDF/Word conversion processors and related types.
Client‑side PDF to DOCX converter using pdf-lib and docx with placeholder text extraction and progress updates.
Empty file placeholder for Word-to-PDF related libraries.
Validates Word files and converts them to PDF via backend API with progress reporting.
Resizes images using various modes, validating inputs and generating resized blobs with progress handling.
Adds text watermarks to each PDF page using pdf-lib with configurable style and progress tracking.
Performs basic client‑side PDF compression via pdf-lib save options and returns a compressed Blob.
Converts multiple images into a PDF with selectable page size, fit mode, margins, and progress updates.
Exports all PDF processing utilities including merge, split, compress, resize, watermark, and image‑to‑PDF.
Merges multiple PDF files client‑side by copying pages into a single pdf-lib document.
Defines standard page size dimensions and a helper for retrieving them.
Deprecated backend PDF client with stubbed functions, retained only for compatibility.
Utility functions for loading pdf-lib from CDN, validating files, reading PDFs, and reporting progress.
Removes specified pages from a PDF after validation and progress updates, producing a new PDF blob.
Resizes each page of a PDF to a target page size, scaling content proportionally and generating a new PDF.
Splits a multi-page PDF into individual PDFs and packages them into a ZIP file using PDFLib and JSZip.
frontend/src/components/tools/SelectedFi: Shows a list of selected files with type and size info, plus optional remove buttons. Helps users manage uploaded files.
Provides structured error normalization and user-friendly error messages for various tool operations.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolExperi: Handles the full workflow for a tool: upload, options, progress, errors, and result download. Manages UI state transitions, auto-scrolling, and step indicators.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolNextSt: Displays a brief animated callout prompting users to proceed to the next step. Highlights instructions with icons and visual emphasis.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPageSh: Provides a page container with title, description, and space for tool-specific content. Standardizes layout for tool pages.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPrimar: A styled primary action button supporting loading states and optional icons. Used for key actions like processing or downloading.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolResult: Shows a success panel with a download button for processed files. Uses a primary action button and triggers blob downloads.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolSecond: A flexible secondary button with optional icon and variants. Used for auxiliary actions within tool flows.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolStepIn: Visually represents the current tool workflow step across upload, settings, and download. Highlights progress using icons and color changes.
frontend/src/components/tools/UploadDrop: Drag-and-drop file selector with validation for file count, size, and extension, returning selected files to a callback.
frontend/src/components/trust/TrustNotes: React component displaying trust-related notes about security, privacy, and client-side processing.
frontend/src/config/toolLimits.ts: Defines file size limits and user-facing error messages for different tool categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoMeta.ts: Custom hook that updates the document title and meta description based on provided values.
frontend/src/hooks/useToolJob.ts: Manages job state for file processing tools, including status, progress, results, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a green-themed design system with custom prose and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/base64.ts: Helpers for converting files to base64 and converting base64 strings into Uint8Array or Blob objects.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility that triggers browser-safe blob downloads with mobile-friendly cleanup handling.
frontend/src/lib/fileFormat.ts: Functions for formatting file sizes and determining human-readable file type labels.
frontend/src/lib/wordToPdfApi.ts: Client helper for invoking backend Word‑to‑PDF conversion with progress tracking and detailed error mapping.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogIndexPage.ts: Renders the blog index with SEO metadata and a list of blog post previews linking to their routes.
frontend/src/pages/blog/HowToCompressPdf: Blog article page explaining how to compress PDFs online with a structured guide and related links.
frontend/src/pages/blog/ResizeImageUnder: Blog page explaining how to resize images under 50KB, with instructions, tips, and links to the resize tool.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page rendering SEO metadata and the main homepage sections such as hero, tools, FAQ, and blog preview.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AddWatermarkPag: Tool page for adding customizable text watermarks to PDFs, handling file input, config options, processing, and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CompressPdfPage: Tool page for compressing a single PDF in-browser, using a processor with progress tracking and related FAQs.
Tool page for converting multiple images to a PDF with page size and fit options, file management, and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MergePdfPage.ts: Tool page that merges multiple PDFs into one using client-side processing, with FAQs and related tool links.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfToWordPage.t: Tool page converting a PDF to DOCX with browser-side text extraction, error handling, and conversion limitations noted.
frontend/src/pages/tools/RemovePagesPage: React page for removing pages from a PDF, handling file selection, page‑range parsing, processing, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizeImagePage: Image‑resize tool page that validates image files, shows previews, processes resizing, and displays output dimensions.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizePdfPage.t: PDF‑resize tool page enabling users to select a PDF, choose a target size, run the resize processor, and handle job states.
frontend/src/pages/tools/SplitPdfPage.ts: PDF‑splitting page that turns each PDF page into separate files packaged in a ZIP, using the split processor and job system.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/INT: Documentation describing the Word‑to‑PDF module, its components, integration details, and API updates.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/Wor: UI card displaying conversion errors with retry action and themed styling.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/wor: Exports static FAQ entries describing usage, limits, and behavior of the Word‑to‑PDF tool.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/Wor: Progress UI card showing upload/convert states, progress bar, and status messaging for Word‑to‑PDF tasks.
Displays the success UI for a completed Word-to-PDF conversion, including download and reset actions.
Defines shared green/white theme classes and colors for the Word-to-PDF tool.
Main container managing file selection, validation, conversion flow, progress, success, and error states.
Provides drag‑and‑drop upload UI and file preview with options to convert or remove the selected file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/word-to-pdf/wor: Validates selected Word files for type and size, enforcing .doc/.docx and a 10MB limit.
frontend/src/pages/tools/WordToPdfPage.t: Main Word‑to‑PDF converter page that wraps the WordToPdfTool with SEO, layout, ads, FAQ, and related‑tool links.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata capturing state, features, issues, and new feature requests.
